title: Data limit exceeded for zone and instance
content:
When creating a service design using the aggregated images of GCP, one of the following error messages may appear:

Data limit exceeded for zone and instance

or

An unknown error has occurred, please contact your system administrator

or

Could not execute batch insert into CSA_VALUE

Cause

The first error message occurs when you exceed the data limit by way of zone(s) and instance(s) combination you selected under Design Configuration when creating a service design.

In case of second or third error message, check the DND logs for "Data exception" error.

Solution

Reduce theÂ number of zones and instances.
